name: Hugh Baird College Skills Switch 2019 Entry
name_original: Hugh Baird College Skills Switch 2019 Entry
description:
This is Hugh Baird College's entry to the 2019 Skills Switch competition, a competition hosted and organised between Blackpool, Southport and Hugh Baird colleges.  This competition sees a group of students, in this case level 2 students make a game that integrates a specific theme in 2 hours.  The theme of this years competition was Colour.  This was the second place entry of the competition for games design. 

Controls - Arrow Keys
